scripts.repository:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.DockerRepositoryApp" --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
scripts.repository:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.DockerRepositoryApp" --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
scripts.network:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.NetworkApp" --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
scripts.network:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.NetworkApp" --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
scripts.service:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.ServiceApp" --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
scripts.service:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.ServiceApp" --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
